title: Am I Banned?
body:
I was trying to log onto the oceanic servers, and the launcher was crashing when I "logged on", so I repeated it, and it it kept crashing. I re-downloaded league, and it did it again. So i tried a friends account, and it worked, i tried both accounts on a other computer and on the the friends account worked.
Thank you for taking your time to read this, please respond asap.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Still experiencing this issue?
While I don't believe you're banned (As this is not behaviour the client would display when banned) it's possible something else might be going on, have you tried contacting Player support?
